ValidationRule.description: CPA Full Name is required on the Prospect Client Record before this opportunity can be marked Sold.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')),
NOT(ISBLANK($User.Job_Name__c)),
NOT($RecordType.Name = 'Core Virtual Sales'),
BEGINS($RecordType.Name,'Core'),
ISBLANK(Account.CPA_Name_Ref__c),
OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Sold'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Sold - Submitted to CTT')),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),'Sold')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CPA Full Name is required on the Prospect Client Record before this opportunity can be marked Sold.
